summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of North 67th Street from Dayton Avenue to Phinney Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, as a public street and highway; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
